Simple Counter app is designed, developed, and released by Khashayar “Khash” Mortazavi (www.khash.tech) and is a completely free, ad-free app that does not require any permission, nor does it collect any user data of any kind. 

This is the initial release of this app, and we would greatly appreciated your comments and suggestions. You can either contact using the ‘contact’ in application’s menu, through Google Play, or simply by sending an email to SimpleCounter@khash.tech 


Thank you for your support, and happy counting!
